page.title: 06GOVERNMENT
page.content: Electors have access to government at 5 levels:via MP for Grantham,via Euro. member for E.M.,via 1 Lincs.county councillor,via{Harmston's}2 &{Coleby's 1 N.Kesteven district councillors and via 7 councillors each on both Parish councils. AGM attendance at{ {Harmston}20,at{Coleby}8; litter,light_ ing, a bus layby, burial space,traffic speed, conservation of buildings, of trees, of hedges and the precept for 2.6% rate for{Harmston}and 1.7% rate for{Coleby}were the concerns for 1985. {LAW AND ORDER:}Based at Waddington there is a Community Constable with a personal radio and car. Good community relations are his priority and traffic accidents the common emergency. The N.Kesteven Magistrates' Court sits in Lincoln.{POLITICS:}Little party feel_ ing apparent. However there is a regular Conservative majority.
